languages.text: {n}Слуга Омниссии не смотрит на вас, он сосредоточенно взирает внутрь собственного тела — на груди его зияет жуткая рана, в которой с лязгом копошатся поблескивающие механизмы. Паскаль осторожно запустил пальцы в ее широкую влажную пасть и ощупывает собственное стальное нутро.{/n}

{n}Pasqal does not look at you, for his gaze is focused inside his own body — there is a horrible gaping wound in his chest, and you see glinting, clanging mechanisms squirming within. Pasqal has plunged his fingers into the wide, dripping maw of the wound and is in the process of palpating his metal innards with great care.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Слуга Омниссии не смотрит на вас, он сосредоточенно взирает внутрь собственного тела — на груди его зияет жуткая рана, в которой с лязгом копошатся поблескивающие механизмы. Паскаль осторожно запустил пальцы в ее широкую влажную пасть и ощупывает собственное стальное нутро.{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルは視線をあなたに向けることはできずにいる。その目は身体の内側に向けられているために。彼の胸には恐ろしい傷口があり、その中にはガランガランと鳴り響き、キラキラと光る機械がうごめいているのが見える。パスカルの指は傷口から滴り落ちる広い裂け目に差し込まれており、それは金属の内部を触診している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal does not look at you, for his gaze is focused inside his own body — there is a horrible gaping wound in his chest, and you see glinting, clanging mechanisms squirming within. Pasqal has plunged his fingers into the wide, dripping maw of the wound and is in the process of palpating his metal innards with great care.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは視線をあなたに向けることはできずにいる。その目は身体の内側に向けられているために。彼の胸には恐ろしい傷口があり、その中にはガランガランと鳴り響き、キラキラと光る機械がうごめいているのが見える。パスカルの指は傷口から滴り落ちる広い裂け目に差し込まれており、それは金属の内部を触診している。{/n}

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡没有看你，他的注意力正集中在自己的身体内部。他的胸膛上被开了个可怕的伤口，你看到里面蠕动着闪闪发光、叮当作响的机械装置。帕斯卡将手指伸进了不断滴血的可怕伤口，小心翼翼地触诊着金属内脏。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal does not look at you, for his gaze is focused inside his own body — there is a horrible gaping wound in his chest, and you see glinting, clanging mechanisms squirming within. Pasqal has plunged his fingers into the wide, dripping maw of the wound and is in the process of palpating his metal innards with great care.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡没有看你，他的注意力正集中在自己的身体内部。他的胸膛上被开了个可怕的伤口，你看到里面蠕动着闪闪发光、叮当作响的机械装置。帕斯卡将手指伸进了不断滴血的可怕伤口，小心翼翼地触摸着金属内脏。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal no te mira, pues tiene la mirada fija en el interior de su propio cuerpo: tiene una horrible herida abierta en el pecho, y ves mecanismos brillantes y ruidosos retorciéndose en su interior. Pasqal ha hundido los dedos en las anchas y goteantes fauces de la herida y está palpando sus entrañas metálicas con sumo cuidado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal does not look at you, for his gaze is focused inside his own body — there is a horrible gaping wound in his chest, and you see glinting, clanging mechanisms squirming within. Pasqal has plunged his fingers into the wide, dripping maw of the wound and is in the process of palpating his metal innards with great care.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal no te mira, pues tiene la mirada fija en el interior de su propio cuerpo: tiene una horrible herida abierta en el pecho, y ves mecanismos brillantes y ruidosos retorciéndose en su interior. Pasqal ha hundido los dedos en las anchas y goteantes fauces de la herida y está palpando sus entrañas metálicas con sumo cuidado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal sieht dich nicht an, denn sein Blick ist in seinen eigenen Körper gerichtet. Auf seiner Brust klafft eine grauenhafte Wunde, in der sich glitzernde, ratternde Mechanismen winden. Pasqal hat seine Finger in den weit geöffneten, triefenden Schlund der Wunde gelegt und ist dabei, mit größter Vorsicht seine metallenen Innereien abzutasten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal does not look at you, for his gaze is focused inside his own body — there is a horrible gaping wound in his chest, and you see glinting, clanging mechanisms squirming within. Pasqal has plunged his fingers into the wide, dripping maw of the wound and is in the process of palpating his metal innards with great care.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal sieht dich nicht an, denn sein Blick ist in seinen eigenen Körper gerichtet. Auf seiner Brust klafft eine grauenhafte Wunde, in der sich glitzernde, ratternde Mechanismen winden. Pasqal hat seine Finger in den weit geöffneten, triefenden Schlund der Wunde gelegt und ist dabei, mit größter Vorsicht seine metallenen Innereien abzutasten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal ne semble pas s'intéresser à vous, fasciné par le trou béant dans sa poitrine à travers lequel vous pouvez voir ses mécanismes s'agiter. Les doigts plongés dans sa blessure dégoulinante, il semble manipuler ses entrailles métalliques avec le plus grand soin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal does not look at you, for his gaze is focused inside his own body — there is a horrible gaping wound in his chest, and you see glinting, clanging mechanisms squirming within. Pasqal has plunged his fingers into the wide, dripping maw of the wound and is in the process of palpating his metal innards with great care.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal ne semble pas s'intéresser à vous, fasciné par le trou béant dans sa poitrine à travers lequel vous pouvez voir ses mécanismes s'agiter. Les doigts plongés dans sa blessure dégoulinante, il semble être en train de manipuler ses entrailles métalliques avec le plus grand soin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bakışları kendi vücudunun içine odaklanmış olan Pasqal, dönüp sana bakmıyor. Göğsündeki korkunç açık yaranın içinde kıvranan parlak, tıkırtılı mekanizmalar gözüne çarpıyor. Parmaklarını apaçık ve sırılsıklam yarasına sokan Pasqal, metal iç organlarını itinayla muayene ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal does not look at you, for his gaze is focused inside his own body — there is a horrible gaping wound in his chest, and you see glinting, clanging mechanisms squirming within. Pasqal has plunged his fingers into the wide, dripping maw of the wound and is in the process of palpating his metal innards with great care.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal dönüp sana bakmıyor çünkü bakışları kendi vücudunun içine odaklanmış: Göğsündeki korkunç açık yaranın içinde kıvranan parlak, tıkırtılı mekanizmalar gözüne çarpıyor. Pasqal, parmaklarını apaçık ve sırılsıklam yarasına sokmuş, itinayla metal iç organlarını muayene ediyor.{/n}
